blocks.heading: It All Starts With Our Feed
blocks.stat:
Chino Valley Ranchers owns and operates  
 _Southern California’s only certified organic feed mill for poultry_  
 to ensure the highest quality and purity.
blocks.subheading: Our commitment to organic goes well beyond standard. We strive to provide you with the highest quality eggs. That’s why we control every step of the process. It all starts with our feed.
